key_risks: Regulatory and compliance risks, particularly anti-money laundering (AML) deficiencies
Economic sensitivity to U.S.-Asia trade and regional downturns
Intense competition from traditional banks and fintech companies
controversies: Federal Reserve enforcement action for AML deficiencies (2015-2023)
Data breach compromising sensitive consumer information (July 2022)
environmental_issues: Commitment to reducing carbon footprint and green financing initiatives
social_issues: Exposure to economic risks in the Asian-American community
governance_issues: Ongoing regulatory compliance challenges with AML, BSA, and OFAC regulations

sources.snippet: Small businesses need to prioritize data privacy now more than ever to protect their customers and stay in business.
